app.name: bfs
app.query: select distinct concat('cnpj_',cnpj) no1, concat('tel_',ddd_telefone) no2, 'telefone' tipo_aresta from (select distinct cnpj, regexp_replace(ddd_telefone, '(^0+(.*?))|([^0-9]+)', '') ddd_telefone from (select B.cnpj, B.ddd_telefone_1, B.ddd_telefone_2 from postgres_olap_lins.dim_licitacao_habilitado A left join dataset.rfb_cnpj_201905 B on A.num_documento = B.cnpj) as rfb lateral view explode(array(translate(ddd_telefone_1, ' ', ''), translate(ddd_telefone_2, ' ', ''))) rfb as ddd_telefone) A where length(ddd_telefone) between 9 and 11 and not (ddd_telefone regexp '0{7,11}|1{7,11}|2{7,11}|3{7,11}|4{7,11}|5{7,11}|6{7,11}|7{7,11}|8{7,11}|9{7,11}')
